about_the_game: The S.I.R. 9000 skin is a visual redesign of S.I.R. and provides him with a new and shiny main frame. This skin isn't sold separately. You can obtain it by purchasing the Supporter Edition - and help us make Botlike an even greater game.
detailed_description: The S.I.R. 9000 skin is a visual redesign of S.I.R. and provides him with a new and shiny main frame. This skin isn't sold separately. You can obtain it by purchasing the Supporter Edition - and help us make Botlike an even greater game.
name: Botlike - a robot's rampage - S.I.R. 9000 skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5750+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+

short_description: The S.I.R. 9000 skin is a visual redesign of S.I.R. and provides him with a new and shiny main frame and new particle effects.
